divs: sighting detailslooked out the window and noticed the outline of a moving shape, at airplane height. no smoke or discharge. i kept blinking to make sure i wasn't seeing things. hovered for 15-20 seconds over our pasture while still maintaining constant jet\airplane altitude. then it flew away at record speed. when it shot away, my gut reaction was, "that was a ufo."
Summary: Ovalish disc shape that was tranparent.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Rockwood
This sighting has never been favorited.
